function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smart building materials containing titanium dioxide (TiO2) nanoparticles for depollution","Impact":"Potential release of acidic products and harmful substances into the environment if not mitigated","Mitigation":"Washing away acidic products by rain or neutralizing them with alkaline materials","Technologies":"Photocatalytic materials, UV lighting systems, alkaline calcium carbonate","People":"General public, building occupants","Owner":"Building developers, construction companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air filtration in buildings","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality leading to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Mechanical and electrical filtration, adsorption, ozonation, photolysis, biological processes","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Ineffective disinfection systems for pathogen control","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of viruses in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective pathogen disinfection systems","Technologies":"UV lighting systems, photocatalytic oxidation, plasma-catalytic hybrid systems","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
